title: Ketu in 6th House for Virgo Ascendant
summary: When Ketu transits the 6th house for Virgo Ascendant, detachment develops toward conflicts, competition, and routine struggles. There is a quiet ability to overcome obstacles without aggression, relying on intuition rather than confrontation. Daily work feels mechanical, and motivation to prove oneself reduces. This phase supports service, healing, and problem-solving done silently, but neglecting health routines or responsibilities can invite imbalance. Conscious discipline is required to convert detachment into efficient execution rather than avoidance.
closing: Ketu in the 6th house enables Virgo Ascendant to rise above conflict, provided discipline anchors daily responsibilities.
